title: BOC User wants to delete a UR waiver request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in
AND a UR waiver request has been submitted for a player
AND user has navigated to request entry section of waivers screen
AND trash can icon is visible on the request form for BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the trash can icon
custom_expected:
THEN UR request should be removed
AND if the user clicks save after removing the request the Release from Roster (URREL) tx should be reversed
AND all appropriate On Reverse updates should be made
AND "Voided" should beadded to the player's history entry
AND Player's roster status should be returned to its previous value

title: User does NOT want to receive error submitting UR waivers for player on DL without indicating he has recovered
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC or Club user
AND current date and request date are during the current season
AND user has navigated to waivers screen 
AND user is attempting to submit a waiver request
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a player 
AND user selects UR as type
custom_expected:
THEN "Player has recovered from ailment and is capable of playing at his accustomed level" checkbox should NOT display
AND when user submits request error message #31 should NOT display
BUT if user selects non-UR waivers (OR, OPT, or TRD) then the checkbox should display
AND if user selects non-UR waivers and attempts to submit without the checkbox checked, error message #31 should display

title: BOC user wants to indicate that player who has UR waivers requested is injured
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in
AND user has navigated to the request entry section of waivers screen
AND user is attempting to submit a UR waiver request for a player
AND selected request date is in the off season (not within current calendar year season start and end system dates)
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a player and UR as Type
custom_expected:
THEN "Injured" checkbox should display on the form for BOC
AND no additional fields should be displayed if Injured checkbox is checked
AND club users should not see this checkbox for UR waiver requests

title: User wants Unexpired Revocable requests cancelled for player when new Irrevocable request submitted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC or Club
AND user has navigated to Request Entry section of waivers screen
AND user has selected a player from the player dropdown 
AND selected player has REVOCABLE Waiver Requests (OPT, TRD) currently in effect (not expired or cancelled)
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects an IRREVOCABLE Waiver type (UR, OR) 
AND clicks Save or Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should cancel previously requested Revocable waivers 
AND Request Result should be set to Cancelled
AND Cancelled Reason should be set to "Irrevocable waivers requested"
AND Waiver Result Status should be set to Cancelled

title: User wants to know if player already had waiver request withdrawn during current waiver period
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND user has navigated to the request entry section of Waivers screen
AND user has selected a player that has already had a waiver request withdrawn during the current waiver period for the same Org
custom_steps: WHEN user chooses TRD or OPT as Waiver Type
custom_expected: THEN "Irrevocable" should be displayed in orange, next to the "Type" label

title: User wants to receive error if non-UR is selected and player has withdrawn requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND user has navigated to request entry section of Waivers screen
AND user has selected a player that has one or more withdrawn waiver requests in the past 30 calendar days
AND user has selected non-UR Waiver Type
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" or "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "Invalid Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] has had waivers withdrawn within 30 days.”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the workflow (BOC Only)

title: User wants to receive error if player has unexpired Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND user has navigated to request entry section of Waivers screen
AND user has selected a player
AND selected player has an unexpired submitted or approved Optional or Trade waiver request
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" or "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Invalid Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] has an unexpired Trade or Optional Assignment waiver request.”
AND clicking "Back" should return user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with waiver request submission (BOC Only)

title: User wants to sort Players with Requested Waivers section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC 
AND user has navigated to Players with Requested Waivers section of Waivers screen
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks any of the column headers in Players with Requested Waivers section
custom_expected:
THEN system should sort the waiver requests displayed in the table by the appropriate column
AND Table headers should be blue
AND Sorting on a column should add the gray background to the column and the red sort icon

title: User wants to sort columns in Results section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC 
AND user has navigated to Results table of Waivers screen
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks any of the column headers in Results table
custom_expected:
THEN system should sort the waiver requests displayed in the table by the appropriate column
AND Table headers should be blue
AND Sorting on a column should add the gray background to the column and the red sort icon

title: Automatically create a UR transaction if UR waivers were requested for a player and no team claimed him
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a UR waiver request has been submitted for one or more players
AND these request(s) do not have a claiming Org
AND these requests have not been cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN the Waiver Results Bulletin is sent
custom_expected:
THEN an Unconditional Release transaction should be created by the system and automatically approved if one does not already exist for this player from this Bulletin
AND Transaction Date  should be set to the Current Date
AND Club and Org should be set to request Org 
AND Create, Approved, and Last Changed Date should be set to the current date
AND Waiver Link Transaction ID should be set to requests's Transaction ID 
AND a system should create a non-clickable link in the player’s history
AND system should create entry in Player History (black font), Description = Unconditional Release, Code = UNCRL , From Org/Club
AND system should update player's MJ and MN Roster Status to Free Agent
AND system should Update player's Org and Club to Null
AND transaction should be added to Daily Transaction Bulletin

title: Club user wants to indicate that player has rejected waiver claim
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in
AND the club has requested UR waivers for one or more players
AND the UR waivers have been claimed
BUT the UR waivers have NOT been cancelled 
AND a Waiver Claim Assignment has not been created for these waivers
AND user sees split button with Player Accept and Player Reject in the "Player Results" table for these players
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Player Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN system should automatically create and submit an Elect Free Agency (Rejection of UR Waiver Claim) Transaction for the associated player
AND "Election Under Article" should be to "Rejection of UR Waiver Claim"
AND Transaction Date should be set to current date
AND system should run all "On Submit" rules, and display any relevant error messages
AND once all On Submit rules pass or are overridden, system should make all Submission Updates

title: BOC user wants to see appropriate button for a player in Results table
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and viewing Waivers screen
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to "Player Results" table within "Results" section
custom_expected:
THEN if Waivers have been cancelled for a player, then no button should display
AND if the BOC can only Cancel waivers for the player, then a simple "Cancel" button should be displayed
AND if the BOC can create a player notification, then a split button should be available with "Player Notif.", and "Cancel" available. (requested UR waivers that were not Claimed and not Cancelled)
AND if the BOC can Player Accept or Player Reject, then a split button should be available with "Player Notif.", "Player Accept", "Player Reject" and "Cancel" available. (requested UR waivers that were Claimed and not Cancelled for which a waiver claim assignment has not yet been created.)
AND if the BOC can Create a Waiver Claim for a player, then a split button should be available with "Create Waiver Claim" and "Cancel" available. (Revocable, claimed requests for which a waiver claim does not already exist)

title: BOC user wants to receive warning if current time is before 1:30 PM of Withdrawal Period Expiration Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in
AND user has navigated to waivers screen
AND user has selected a request date that has one or more players displayed in the "Withdrawal Process" table 
AND current time is prior to 1:30 PM ET on the Withdrawal Period Expiration Date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Execute Withdrawal Process
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error “The Waiver Withdrawal Process should not be executed until 1:30 pm on the withdrawal period expiration date.”
AND clicking "Back" should return user to the form 
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the workflow (BOC Only)

title: BOC user wants to see players in Withdrawal Process section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in
AND user has navigated to Waivers screen
custom_steps: WHEN user has selects a Request Date, with one or more requests entered, for which the Result Bulletin has been sent
custom_expected:
THEN "Withdrawal Process" section should display 
AND if it is currently on or after the Withdrawal Period Expiration Date this section should be expanded by default, along with the "Results" section
AND the section should display a table of players that qualify for the withdrawal process per the provided wireframe
AND players that qualify for the withdrawal process should be those with a revocable waiver request that has been awarded and not cancelled, but no submitted or approved Waiver Claim Assignment exists for this waiver request
BUT if there is not at least one player to display then the text "No Players Eligible for Withdrawal Process" should appear

title: BOC user wants to execute a Waiver Claim Withdrawal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in 
AND user has navigated to the Waivers screen
AND user has selected a Request Date for which at least one player is displayed in the "Withdrawal Process" section
AND current date is equal to or after Withdrawal Period Expiration Date
AND "Execute Withdrawal Process" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Execute Withdrawal Process"
custom_expected:
THEN system should withdraw the waivers for the players displayed
AND system should set the Waiver Result Status to Withdrawn
AND system should set the Eligible Org’s Claim Result to “Withdrawn on [Withdrawal Expiration Date (mm/dd/yyyy)]”
AND system should set the "Withdrawal" date on the player profile to the Withdrawal Expiration Date

title: User wants to receive notification when player's waivers are withdrawn
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a waiver request has been submitted for a player
AND that waiver request was subsequently claimed by at least one Org
AND that waiver request was subsequently withdrawn
custom_steps: WHEN the waiver request achieves a Result of "Withdrawn"
custom_expected:
THEN notification should be generated for any users with any waiver permission for the requesting Org
AND notification should be generated for any users with any waiver permission for the Eligible Org
AND this notification should be generated anytime a waiver request achieves a result of Withdrawn
AND description should read "Waiver Request for [date] - Waiver withdrawn"
AND description should be a hyperlink to the Waivers screen with the associated Request Date selected

title: BOC user wants to edit Cancellation Reason for cancelled Waivers on a player's profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an "editors" role for the waivers section of the player profile
AND by default this permission has ONLY been given to BOC waivers users
AND BOC user with this permission set is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Transactions tab of a player profile
custom_expected:
THEN there should be an "Edit" button on the Transactions tab
AND clicking "Edit" should reload the screen in edit mode, and enable a Save button
AND Cancellation Reason field in the Waiver History table should be the only field on the page editable
AND Cancellation Reason should be editable for all waivers
AND user should be able to enter a text value in the field and hit "Save".
AND clicking "Save" should save the changes made and trigger a blue successful save notification

title: User wants sending Results Bulletin to appropriately update player's Waiver info on their profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC or club user is logged in
AND TRD, OR or OPT waivers have been requested for one or more players 
AND the relevant Waiver Request Bulletin containing these players has been sent
AND the relevant Waiver Result Bulletin containing these players has been sent
custom_steps: WHEN user views the Waiver information on relevant player's profile
custom_expected:
THEN in the "In Effect" section "Yes" should be populated for players who secured waivers, 
AND "Good Until" date should show their Waiver Expiration Date
BUT "No" should be entered for players who did not secure waivers 
AND "History" should be updated for players that have any Result on the Results Bulletin ("History" should not be updated when request is entered)
AND Secured, Claimed By, and Awarded columns should be populated

title: Updates to Results Bulletin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Results Bulletin has generated with one or more requests and claims entered
custom_steps: WHEN Club user receives Result Bulletin Email notification
custom_expected:
THEN in addition to what is detailed here: (https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/128679367), bulletin should be ordered by Player Name (Last, First)
AND for Clubs, each separate section should be ordered by Player Name

title: Updates to the Request Bulletin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a request bulletin has been generated for a Request Date with one or more requests entered
custom_steps: WHEN user (Club or BOC) receives Request Bulletin Email notification
custom_expected:
THEN in addition to what is detailed here: (https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/128626185), requests with the same type submitted by the same Org should be grouped under a heading
AND requests should be ordered by waiver type (OPT, OUT, TRD, UR), League (AL first then NL), Org and then Player Name
AND if a date has no waiver requests, or if a date has no TRD requests, then any bulletin that would be entirely blank will send as "mm/dd/yyyy No Waiver Requests"
AND the body of the No Waiver Request email is blank, and no pdf is attached
AND "Last Tx:" should only be displayed if there is actually a Last Tx populated. 
BUT if there is not a Last tx populated this label should not appear
AND "Comments:" should appear, along with the comments entered for the Waiver Request for those requests that have comments associated. 
BUT if a request does not have a comment entered, the label should not appear

title: User wants to see successful save notification when saving Emails tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND user has navigated  to the Emails tab on Utilities dashboard
AND user makes some changes to the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN system should generate a blue successful save notification

title: User wants to see Email Utility on Utilities Dashboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to "Utilities" dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN "Emails" tab should be removed from "System Admin" dashboard and should be visible on "Utilities" dashboard
AND All collapse/expand sections of the Emails tab should be collapsed by default

title: User wants to view Transactions section of Email Utility using newly provided layout
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC or Club user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Transactions section of the Email Utility from System Admin on left nav
custom_expected: THEN layout of transactions section should match provided wireframe

title: BOC user wants to send Waiver Result Bulletin to Club users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and attempting to send a Waiver Result Bulletin
AND Send Emails" is set to "YES"
AND "Send Notification" is checked off under "Result Bulletin" for Club users
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Result Bulletin"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result bulletin with "Send Notification" selected for Clubs that have Result Bulletin - Send Notification selected. All Waiver Requests will be included
AND system should also generate an email to all users listed in the Email Utility Result Bulletin with "Send Notification, no trades" selected for the Org(s) that have Result Bulletin - Send Notification, No TRDs selected
BUT this email should be identical to the one generated for "Send Notification", except no TRD requests should be shown
AND Subject of the emails should be "mm/dd/yyyy Wvr Res Bulletin" with the Request Date displayed
AND Top of email should display (with proper bulletin #and dates populated):
-MLB - Waiver Result Bulletin
-Full Club Name (Ex: Los Angeles Dodgers)
AND The remainder of the email should be broken out into two sections. Each section only appears if it is relevant to the Club
AND bulletin should display a "Results" section that details the results for any requests that the viewing Org submitted. If none were submitted for this request date, this should not be displayed. Format as follows:
Results of request bulletin 1003347 dated Tue 08/09/2016 which expired on Thu 08/11/2016
-Format of each result should be:
-Player Last, Player First M.I. - Type (ex:TRD)
-{Waiver Result}
AND if player was not claimed, Waiver Result should match what is displayed on the Results section for BOC (ex: Secured through end of the Championship Season)
BUT if player was claimed, then Claiming information should be shown. Eligible Org has . 
Example:
-Claimed by: MIA 8/11/2016 12:58
-TB 8/11/2016 12:32
-LAA 8/11/2016 12:46
-TOR 8/11/2016 12:35
-HOU 8/10/2016 16:16
-NYY 8/11/2016 12:44
AND after the Request section, a section should appear detailing the results of any Claims that the Org made, if any
BUT if no claims were made by the Org then this section does not appear. Format as follows:
Results of your claims from request bulletin 1003347 dated Tue 08/09/2016 which expired on Thu 08/11/2016
-Player Last, Player First M.I. - Type (ex:TRD)
-{Waiver Claim Result}
AND Bottom of email should contain -
"ALL WAIVER INFORMATION IS TO REMAIN STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL. DO NOT FORWARD THIS INFORMATION. VIOLATIONS MAY RESULT IN FINES OR OTHER DISCIPLINE. End of Bulletin *"

title: BOC user wants to send Waiver Result Bulletin to Club users - Send Notif./Send Emails = NO
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and attempting to send a Waiver Result Bulletin
AND Send Emails" is set to "NO"
OR "Send Notification" under "Result Bulletin" for Club users  is unchecked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Send Result Bulletin"
custom_expected: THEN no email should be sent

title: User wants PDF of Results Bulletin attached to the email they receive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND email addresses have been entered in Waivers section of email utility for BOC and one or more clubs
custom_steps: WHEN a Waiver Result Bulletin is sent
custom_expected:
THEN Waiver Results email received by BOC and Club users entered on email utility should have a PDF of the day's bulletin attached 
BUT if no entries exist, then no attachment should be provided

title: User wants to search for Waivers
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC or club user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Advanced Search
custom_expected:
THEN "Waivers" should be added as a Search Type
AND selecting "Waivers" should load Waivers advanced search
AND default filter selection should be "Date" 
AND once one or more filters have been added, the user should be able to run an advanced search and see results per the search requirements

title: User wants to search for Waivers - Permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND logged in user has permission to view the Waivers Screen
AND user has navigated to advanced search screen
custom_steps: WHEN user executes an Advanced Search for Waivers
custom_expected:
THEN BOC users should be able to see all results
BUT Club users should only be able to see:
-All requests that have been included on a Request Bulletin (NO Pending requests)
-All Claims made by their own Org that have been included on a Results Bulletin
-All Claims made by other Orgs on requests they entered that have been included on a Results Bulletin
-All Withdrawals made by their own Org

title: Club user wants to receive notification when their Org has placed a claim
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Waiver Request has been entered for a player
custom_steps: WHEN a claim has been entered on the request for this player
custom_expected:
THEN the Club that actually placed the claim should get a notification when any user in their Org places a claim on a player
AND this notification should be generated for the Club waivers viewers and requesters roles
AND description should read "Waiver Request for [date] - ORG has placed a claim on this player". 
AND this should be a hyperlink to the Waivers screen with the associated Request Date selected
BUT the Club that the request originated from should not get a notification when this occurs
AND  BOC should not get a notification when this occurs

title: User wants to receive notification when player's waivers are cancelled
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Waiver Request has been submitted for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the Waiver Request achieves a result of "Cancelled" (whether by manual cancellation from the BOC or by automatic cancellation from the system (ex: Due to a DL transaction))
custom_expected:
THEN notification should be generated for any users with any waiver permission for the BOC and for the requesting Org
AND description should read "Waiver Request for [date] - Waiver cancelled" 
AND this should be a hyperlink to the Waivers screen with the associated Request Date selected

title: User wants to see historical types on waivers pre-2007
custom_preconds: GIVEN system now recognizes that ML waivers are now considered TRD waivers and SPL are now considered OPT waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user conducts a Waivers Advanced Search for "OPT" or "TRD" waivers
custom_expected:
THEN for "OPT" search, system should correctly return SPL waivers, but the Type should display as SPL for them
BUT if the user clicks into the waiver screen, they should still display as "OPT" waivers on the actual waiver screen
AND for "TRD" search, system should correctly return ML waivers, but the Type should display as ML for them
BUT if the user clicks into the waiver screen, they should still display as "TRD" waivers on the actual waiver screen
AND in players' waiver history, SPL and ML waivers should display as SPL or ML waiver requests

title: User does not want to see Waivers tab if they don't have permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in who does NOT have permissions for Waivers (ex:admin-boc-mnc)
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to transactions dashboard
custom_expected: THEN user should NOT see "Waivers" tab at all

title: BOC user wants to Batch-expire any effective waivers they select
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in
AND user has navigated to "Waiver Expiration Batch" option, under the "Player Profile" section on the batch screen
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks  "Waiver Expiration Batch"
custom_expected:
THEN system should open the batch in the batch screen
AND batch parameters should display per the batch requirements
AND "Run" button should be available
AND clicking "Run" should run the batch according to the selected parameters
AND for each record, system should set the respective Waiver Effective Flag to 0 and the Waiver Effective Date to null
AND "Batch Results" should include the standard results columns (Player ID, Name, Org, Club, Roster Status) sorted by Name
AND Batch Results should include all player profiles that had waivers expired

title: Updates to "Send Bulletin" buttons
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to a Request date on the waivers screen with one or more waiver requests entered
custom_expected:
THEN "Send Request Bulletin" or the "Send Results Bulletin" button(s) should not be available unless the Org filter is set to All
AND "Send Request Bulletin" button should be available on the Request Expiration date, regardless of time
AND once Request bulletin has been sent, there should no longer be a "Send Request Bulletin" button at all (requires removal of split button)
AND once the Results Bulletin has been sent, there should no longer be a "Send Results Bulletin" button
AND there should not be a "Send Results Bulletin" ever available for a date on which a blank Request Bulletin was sent

title: User wants to print PDF of Results Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND user has navigated to waivers screen
AND user has chosen a request date for which the Result Bulletin has already been sent
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Print"
custom_expected:
THEN system should allow the user to select "Result Bulletin" from the options available
AND Selecting Result Bulletin should download a pdf of that day's Result Bulletin for the viewing Org to the user's computer
BUT if no Requests exist for the date then no Print button displays

title: User wants to print PDF of Request Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND user has navigated to waivers screen
AND user has chosen a request date for which the Request Bulletin has already been sent
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Print"
custom_expected:
THEN system should allow the user to select "Request Bulletin" from the options available
AND selecting Request Bulletin should download a pdf of that day's Request Bulletin to the user's computer
BUT if no Requests exist for the date then no Print button displays
